title: Caprock's Weatherley-White: Plotting for Post-Carbon Era(Audio)
itunes:title: Caprock's Weatherley-White: Plotting for Post-Carbon Era(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Matthew Weatherley-White, Managing director of The Caprock Group and the architect of their Impact Platform, discusses the energy landscape and the emerging outline of a post-carbon era.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
